In England, in the seven days to 24 February, there were 187,728 new confirmed cases (332.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 February, there were 251,557 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (63,829 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 March is 16,085,841 (28,445.3 cases per 100,000 population).
